articles.author: Sumit Arora
articles.title: Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024: India women win title - Adda247
articles.description: In an unforgettable showdown at Shah Alam, Malaysia, the Indian women’s badminton team etched their names into history by clinching a historic gold medal at the Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024. This victory marks a groundbreaking moment in India’s badm…
